name: com.wrapped.ytmusic
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.package:release: rm -f release.apks && npm run build:release && bundletool build-apks --bundle platforms/android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.aab --output release.apks --mode=universal && mv release.apks releases.zip

author: Apache Cordova Team
